Sentencas: In this study, ceramic fibers are used as a filler material for glass ceramic sealant in solid oxide fuel cells to improve the thermal cycle behavior.
Titulo: Fabrication of glass ceramic sealants with ceramic fiber filler for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Beside the bare glass ceramic sealant for comparison, multilayered sealants with different ceramic fiber contents are fabricated to investigate the effect of ceramic fiber quantity also.
Titulo: Fabrication of glass ceramic sealants with ceramic fiber filler for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The mechanical performances of the samples are measured via tensile tests by placing them between two metallic interconnector plates after the glass formation process as well as after 1, 5 and 10 thermal cycles.
Titulo: Fabrication of glass ceramic sealants with ceramic fiber filler for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results show that the mechanical strength in general tends to decrease with increasing the ceramic filler content, which can be attributed to poor adhesion due to reduced glass ceramic composition.
Titulo: Fabrication of glass ceramic sealants with ceramic fiber filler for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: On the other hand, thermal cycle behavior of the samples with ceramic fibers is found to be improved at some extend.
Titulo: Fabrication of glass ceramic sealants with ceramic fiber filler for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This may be due to the behavior of ceramic filler network and relatively slow crystallization with increasing the amount of the filler as proven by microstructural observations.
Titulo: Fabrication of glass ceramic sealants with ceramic fiber filler for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Especially for the sample including 4 ceramic fiber interlayers each having 0.030 g ceramic fibers, the mechanical strength shows an increasing trend with the number of thermal cycles.
Titulo: Fabrication of glass ceramic sealants with ceramic fiber filler for solid oxide fuel cells
